Articles.Content:
After some random trolling i came up with this: The P-50 or the awesome ant-powered pocket plane! its turning circle is ridiculously tiny and it can get up to very high speeds! Enjoy

maybe you don't see it at first, but it's there turning at 100m/s in a split second and that without even using its engine!

Craft file: https://www./?oc3ndo8lqtbvryw
The high speeds are probably due to the infiniglide glitch. I've experienced this when using very small craft like this one.

I like it!

Its always interesting to see what the KSP community comes up with
